resources.string: Hello my name is Laika and in 1957 I became the first living being to orbit the earth
... I will guide you to learn a little more about space. For each correct answer you will get a medal. Are you ready?
\u0020points, let\'s see which character corresponds to your medals
Your medals correspond to Neil Armstrong, the first human being to step on the moon, let\'s see your position in the ranking. Let\'s see!
Your medals correspond to Yuri Gagarin, the first human being to orbit the earth, let\'s see your position in the ranking. Let\'s see!
Your medals correspond to Valentina Tereshkova, the first woman to go to space, let\'s see your position in the ranking. Let\'s see!
Your medals correspond to Buzz Aldrin, the second human being to step on the moon, let\'s see your position in the ranking. Let\'s see!
Your medals correspond to a meteorite, let\'s see your position in the ranking. Let\'s see!
